name: Tower up
description:
The world is small. Too small... Escape it by reaching the top of the highest tower !

- Vertical 2D platformer : up and behond !
- Hard difficulty level : are you skilled enought to handle it ?
- Obstacle, enemies, spikes : avoid them, or diiiie !
- Free roaming big sized world : 1.567855942887398e-10 times the radius of the earth (WoW)
